data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karaytuğ, Süphan (2014): Systematics of the genus Heterolaophonte (Crustacea, Copepoda, Harpacticoida), with redescription of H. uncinata and H. curvata. Zootaxa 3780 (3): 503-533, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.3.4
